content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL with 48 units of iron ore loaded.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates; holds fuel {coal: 2}, has produced 6 copper plates, energy 1600.0, and status: NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing research "automation" with lab_input {automation-science-pack: 10}; status: NO_POWER and electrical_id updated to 13048.
- ElectricityGroup with id=13048 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(2.5, 21.5) with connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); warnings: "not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"; status: NOT_CONNECTED.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding ~199.97 units of water at 15°C; status: NO_FUEL with warning "out of fuel"; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); fluid_system updated to [48956].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding ~99.87 units of water at 15°C; status: WORKING; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_system updated to [48956].
- Pipeline Network Consists of:
  • PipeGroup at position(-6.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=48956; status: WORKING.
  • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=48957; status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 21.5) with fluid_system=48958; status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-3.5, 23.5) with fluid_system=48963; status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=48962; status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(3.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=48967; status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(2.5, 24.5) with fluid_system=48966; status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system=48969; status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Pipeline Connection Identifier Inconsistency:
  • Repeated attempts to connect the boiler output to the steam engine inlet using various fluid_system values (48612, 48655, 48698, 48741, 48784, 48827, 48870, 48913) have all resulted in "No working PipeGroup" errors.
  • Tip: Dynamically retrieve and validate the active fluid_system identifiers from the pipeline network before initiating a connection.

- Hardcoded Fluid System Assumptions:
  • Relying on preset fluid_system values has led to multiple pipeline connection failures.
  • Tip: Determine the correct fluid_system identifier at runtime to match the boiler output with an available working PipeGroup.

- Fuel Supply Oversight:
  • The boiler remains out of fuel, impeding effective steam generation.
  • Tip: Monitor and replenish the fuel supply to ensure the boiler remains operational.
